q1: Were you pleased with Sweden's performance in the world cup in 2018?
a1: It wasn't awful but they could have done better
q2: I think they did okay for a Swedish team.
a2: I love that our expectations are "They did okay for a swedish team" lol
q3: Would some increased team speed and a decrease in physicality/size help them be a better squad?
a3: I think an increase in speed and tightening up their midfield would be the best thing for them. Their height can be an advantage against shorter teams
a4: This is because Sweden can have better ball control and lead them to put more pressure on their opposition.
q5: Do you think Sweden miss Ibra?
